Oh okay. Well the list of Rune prices are in my above post anyhow.

Here, I found the prices for runes. To make two standard/simple rune pages once you hit 20, one for AD and one for AP, I have calculated the costs below. Note that these are variable and interchangeable for your own wants, but these are the ones I use.

**AD Page**
_**Marks of Attack Damage:**_ 1230 (6x205)
_**Seals of Armour:**_ 1230 (6x205)
_**Glyphs of Scaling Magic Resist:**_ 1230 (6x1230)
_**Quints of Attack Damage:**_ 2050 (2x1025)
_**Total:**_ 5740IP

**AP Page**
_**Marks of Magic Penetration:**_ 2460 (6x410)
_**Seals of Scaling Health:**_ 2460 (6x410)
_**Glyphs of Ability Power:**_ 2460 (6x410)
_**Quints of Ability Power:**_ 2050 (2x1025)
_**Total:**_ 9430IP

_**Total of Totals:**_ 15,170IP

As I said you can switch the runes around, especially the Quints since they offer the most utility out of the bunch of them. Here is a link to the list of Runes I used. I don't know if the stats are up to date, but the prices seem to be. It is just to the LoLWiki.
http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/List_of_runes
It seems like every once in a while I build up a large amount of IP only to have it disappear on new pages and runes.
